title: EYE #45!
content:
This link leads you to a site where the contents of EYE #45 is described:   
Type -- Lettering -- Famous Designers -- The Future of Type...   
   
 [http://www.eyemagazine.com/backissues.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104055624/http:/www.eyemagazine.com/backissues.php)   
   
I am looking forward to that one!   
   
--   
Soren O
author: soreno
